articles.description: Liverpool are planning a huge £59m offer to prise Robert Lewandowski away from Bayern Munich, according to ambitious reports in the Spanish media.
articles.content:
Liverpool are planning a huge £59m offer to prise Robert Lewandowski away from Bayern Munich, according to ambitious reports in the Spanish media.
The iconic Poland striker has been with Bayern for … [+2839 chars]
